title: GitHub Enterprise Server 安全漏洞
description:
GitHub Enterprise Server 是 （Github）开源的一个应用软件。提供一个将自己的GitHub实例设置为虚拟设备，从而提供可扩展，易于管理的平台。
GitHub Enterprise Server存在安全漏洞，该漏洞源于软件中的一个不恰当的访问控制漏洞允许工作流作业在它本不应该访问的自托管runner组中执行。这将影响使用自托管runner组进行访问控制的客户。访问一个企业runner组的存储库可以访问组织中的所有企业runner组，因为在请求期间进行了不正确的身份验证检查。这可能会导致代码被不正确的运行程序组无意中运行。

目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接：
https://docs.github.com/en/enterprise-server@3.1/admin/release-notes#3.1.8

title: WebKit畸形'TIFF'图像内存破坏漏洞
description: WebKit是一款开放源代码的浏览器引擎。WebKit处理畸形TIFF图像存在漏洞，具体的说，当Safari无法正确释放对象时可触发一个释放后使用漏洞。对象内存释放后，仍旧保留一个对对象的引用。当引用之后用于访问对象时，会把非法内存作为合法对象，并且对象的vtable用于间接函数调用。这可导致一个任意代码执行。
solution: Apple Safari 5.0.6和5.1已经修复此漏洞，建议用户下载使用：http://www.apple.com/safari/download/

title: Brocade Bigiron/Fastiron/Netiron/Turboiron OSPF 拒绝服务漏洞
description:
OSPF(Open Shortest Path First开放式最短路径优先 )是一个内部网关协议(Interior Gateway Protocol,简称IGP)，通过路由器之间通告网络接口的状态来建立链路状态数据库，生成最短路径树，每个OSPF路由器使用这些最短路径构造路由表。

Brocade路由器中的OSPF路由协议实现在执行LSA数据库操作前，没有考虑链路状态通告包里链接状态ID值复制的可能性，允许远程攻击者发起拒绝服务攻击(路由中断)或者通过精心制作的LSA包获取敏感信息包信息。
solution:
目前没有详细的解决方案：
http://www.brocade.com

title: zte zxhn_z500_firmware 输入验证不恰当
description: Some ZTE devices have input verification vulnerabilities. The devices support configuring a static prefix through the web management page. The restriction of the front-end code can be bypassed by constructing a POST request message and sending the request to the creation of a static routing rule configuration interface. The WEB service backend fails to effectively verify the abnormal input. As a result, the attacker can successfully use the vulnerability to tamper parameter values. This affects: ZXHN Z500 V1.0.0.2B1.1000 and ZXHN F670L V1.1.10P1N2E. This is fixed in ZXHN Z500 V1.0.1.1B1.1000 and ZXHN F670L V1.1.10P2N2.

title: Windows UAC提权漏洞（CVE-2019-1388）
description: 该漏洞位于Windows的UAC（User Account Control，用户帐户控制）机制中。默认情况下，Windows会在一个单独的桌面上显示所有的UAC提示——Secure Desktop。这些提示是由名为consent.exe的可执行文件产生的，该可执行文件以NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM权限运行，完整性级别为System。因为用户可以与该UI交互，因此必须对UI进行严格限制。否则，低权限的用户可能可以通过UI操作的循环路由以SYSTEM权限执行操作。即使隔离状态的看似无害的UI特征都可能会成为引发任意控制的动作链的第一步。事实上，UAC对话框已被精简，仅包含最少的可单击选项。
solution: 官方补丁：https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2019-1388

iOS是由苹果公司为移动设备所开发的操作系统；Safari是苹果计算机的最新操作系统；Mac OS X中的浏览器。iTunes是一款数字媒体播放应用程序。

Apple iOS 9.1之前版本、Safari 9.0.1之前版本、iTunes 12.3.1之前版本的WebKit存在安全漏洞。允许远程攻击者利用漏洞，通过构造的网站，执行任意代码或发起拒绝服务攻击(内存破坏或应用崩溃)。
solution:
目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载：
https://support.apple.com/zh-cn/HT205370

description: Java SE中的漏洞，Oracle Java SE的Java SE嵌入式组件（子组件：网络）。受影响的支持版本是Java SE：7u221,8u212,11.0.3和12.0.1; Java SE Embedded：8u211。难以利用漏洞允许未经身份验证的攻击者通过多种协议进行网络访问，从而危及Java SE，Java SE Embedded。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致对某些Java SE，Java SE Embedded可访问数据的未授权更新，插入或删除访问，以及对Java SE嵌入式Java SE嵌入式可访问数据的未授权读取访问。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙盒Java小程序（在Java SE 8中）的客户端中，这些客户端加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如，来自Internet的代码）并依赖于Java安全沙箱。也可以通过在指定的组件中使用API​​来利用此漏洞，例如，通过向API提供数据的Web服务。 CVSS 3.0基本分数4.8（机密性和完整性影响）。 CVSS矢量：（CVSS：3.0 / AV：N / AC：H / PR：N / UI：N / S：U / C：L / I：L / A：N）。
solution: 厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/security-advisory/cpujul2019-5072835.html

title: sooil anydana-a_firmware 关键功能的认证机制缺失

solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: CLI命令中与虚拟化管理器（VMAN）相关的漏洞
description: 在Cisco NX-OS软件中与虚拟化管理器(VMAN)相关的CLI命令中的一个漏洞可能允许经过身份验证的本地攻击者在底层Linux操作系统上执行具有根特权的任意命令。此漏洞是由于在受影响的设备上传递给特定VMAN CLI命令的参数验证不足造成的。攻击者可以通过包含恶意输入作为受影响命令的参数来利用此漏洞。成功的攻击可能允许攻击者在底层Linux操作系统上使用根特权执行任意命令，这可能导致完全的系统破坏。攻击者需要有效的管理员凭证来利用此漏洞。

title: octobercms october 授权机制缺失
description: October is a free, open-source, self-hosted CMS platform based on the Laravel PHP Framework. In October CMS from version 1.0.319 and before version 1.0.469, an authenticated backend user with the cms.manage_pages, cms.manage_layouts, or cms.manage_partials permissions who would normally not be permitted to provide PHP code to be executed by the CMS due to cms.enableSafeMode being enabled is able to write specific Twig code to escape the Twig sandbox and execute arbitrary PHP. This is not a problem for anyone that trusts their users with those permissions to normally write & manage PHP within the CMS by not having cms.enableSafeMode enabled, but would be a problem for anyone relying on cms.enableSafeMode to ensure that users with those permissions in production do not have access to write & execute arbitrary PHP. Issue has been patched in Build 469 (v1.0.469) and v1.1.0.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: EMC Documentum eRoom索引服务器HummingBird连接器远程缓冲区溢出漏洞
description: EMC Documentum是一款企业文档和图像管理工具，使文档的创建、修改、跟踪和在业务过程中的利用变得高效、规范和严谨。EMC Documentum eRoom索引服务器OpenText HummingBird Connector捆绑实现存在缺陷。当解析TCP连接中的特定报文时，应用程序会尝试拷贝部分报文内容到基于栈的缓冲区溢出，由于没有完全考虑报文中的数据包大小，应用程序会覆盖缓冲区之后的变量，导致以服务器上下文执行任意代码。
solution: EMC Documentum eRoom 7.4.3.f已修复此漏洞，建议用户下载使用：http://www.emc.com/products/detail/software2/eroom.htm

title: acronis true_image_2020 缺省权限不正确
description: An issue was discovered in Acronis True Image 2020 24.5.22510. anti_ransomware_service.exe keeps a log in a folder where unprivileged users have write permissions. The logs are generated in a predictable pattern, allowing an unprivileged user to create a hardlink from a (not yet created) log file to anti_ransomware_service.exe. On reboot, this forces the anti_ransomware_service to try to write its log into its own process, crashing in a SHARING VIOLATION. This crash occurs on every reboot.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

The “search term" search functionality is not sufficiently sanitized while displaying the results of the search, which can be leveraged to inject arbitrary scripts. These scripts are executed in a victim’s browser when they enter the crafted URL. In the worst case, the victim who inadvertently triggers the attack is a highly privileged administrator. description: JAI-EXT is an open-source project which aims to extend the Java Advanced Imaging (JAI) API. Programs allowing Jiffle script to be provided via network request can lead to a Remote Code Execution as the Jiffle script is compiled into Java code via Janino, and executed. In particular, this affects the downstream GeoServer project. Version 1.2.22 will contain a patch that disables the ability to inject malicious code into the resulting script. Users unable to upgrade may negate the ability to compile Jiffle scripts from the final application, by removing janino-x.y.z.jar from the classpath.

title: ldap-account-manager ldap_account_manager 在web页面生成时对输入的转义处理不恰当（跨站脚本）
description: LDAP Account Manager (LAM) is an open source web frontend for managing entries stored in an LDAP directory. The profile editor tool has an edit profile functionality, the parameters on this page are not properly sanitized and hence leads to stored XSS attacks. An authenticated user can store XSS payloads in the profiles, which gets triggered when any other user try to access the edit profile page. The pdf editor tool has an edit pdf profile functionality, the logoFile parameter in it is not properly sanitized and an user can enter relative paths like ../../../../../../../../../../../../../usr/share/icons/hicolor/48x48/apps/gvim.png via tools like burpsuite. Later when a pdf is exported using the edited profile the pdf icon has the image on that path(if image is present). Both issues require an attacker to be able to login to LAM admin interface. The issue is fixed in version 7.9.1.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。
